messages.title: My Priorities for Plymouth Sutton and Devonport
messages.content: Rebecca Smith outlines her key priorities for Plymouth Sutton and Devonport, focusing on delivering the best NHS for Plymouth, more money for every school child in the city, and backing local business.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: DELIVERING THE BEST NHS FOR PLYMOUTH
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rebecca Smith is a champion of the NHS and pledges to work with local community pharmacies, dentists, and GPs to ensure more government funding and provide the services Plymouth needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MORE MONEY FOR EVERY SCHOOL CHILD IN THE CITY
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She wants to ensure Plymouth schools have fair share to provide children and young people with the education they deserve, enabling them to dream big for the future.

Coming from a small business household, she understands the risks and challenges involved in providing jobs and investment in the local economy. She commits to keep meeting and promoting local and new businesses investing in the city.

issues.education: Rebecca Smith is committed to providing more money for every school child in Plymouth, ensuring fair funding for schools.
issues.health: She is a huge champion of the NHS and is working to help it secure more government funding and improve services in Plymouth, including community pharmacies, dentists, and GPs.

images.caption: Rebecca Smith with constituents and views of Plymouth.
